message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
I'll take half, you can't do better than that!
I'll compromise, but I'm still worth more than you!
You're getting desperate, I'm taking the majority!
I'm not giving up yet! Meet me in the middle!
You're getting closer to my number, but still too low!
It's time to be fair, Bob. 50/50 is the way to go!
